properties.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 12 at 2:20AM CST until February 13 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Aberdeen SD
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total
snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as
55 mph. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills
expected. Wind chills as low as 40 below zero.

* WHERE...Buffalo County.

* WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 6 AM this morning
to 6 PM CST this evening. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from
noon today to noon CST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The
dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed
skin in as little as 10 minutes.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a
hat, and gloves.

The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO NOON CST THURSDAY
